      Create a OAuth2 auth provider

      Create a OAuth2 auth provider
      static OAuth2Auth OAuth2Auth.create(Vertx vertx, OAuth2FlowType flow)
      Deprecated. 
      the flow configuration should be passed in the config object
      static OAuth2Auth OAuth2Auth.create(Vertx vertx, OAuth2FlowType flow, OAuth2ClientOptions config)
      Deprecated. 
      the flow configuration should be passed in the config object
      static OAuth2Auth OAuth2Auth.createKeycloak(Vertx vertx, OAuth2FlowType flow, JsonObject config)
      Deprecated. 
      You should use the provider helper KeycloakAuth instead. Create a OAuth2 auth provider
      OAuth2Auth OAuth2Auth.decodeToken(String token, Handler<AsyncResult<AccessToken>> handler)
      Deprecated. 
      use AuthProvider.authenticate(JsonObject, Handler) instead.
      default OAuth2Auth OAuth2Auth.introspectToken(String token, Handler<AsyncResult<AccessToken>> handler)
      Deprecated. 
      OAuth2Auth OAuth2Auth.introspectToken(String token, String tokenType, Handler<AsyncResult<AccessToken>> handler)
      Deprecated. 
      OAuth2Auth OAuth2Auth.loadJWK(Handler<AsyncResult<Void>> handler)
      Deprecated. 
      OAuth2Auth OAuth2Auth.rbacHandler(OAuth2RBAC rbac)
      Deprecated.
